welcomeTo: Welcome to largest art community in the Nordics
artPortableDescription: Your Artportable portfolio is a tool that helps you present your art in a professional way. Artportable is a meeting point for artists, art buyers and art enthusiasts.
youCanAlwaysUpdateYourMembership: You can always update your membership package
featureVisibility: Exposure in Artportable's flows and category pages
featureOrganizeWorks: Organize your works as you want
featureStatistics: See statistics about your most popular works and profile views

portfolioMini.name: Portfolio Mini
portfolioMini.subtitle: For artists wanting to try with limited access.

portfolio.name: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: For artists who want to showcase and sell their work.

portfolioPremium.name: Portfolio Premium
portfolioPremium.subtitle: For artists who want priority visibility and additional benefits.
